00040 gboolean
00041 luau_install_rpm(const char *filename, GError **err) {
00042         int ret;
00043         char *execString;
00044         gboolean result;
00045         
00046         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00047 
00048         execString = lutil_mprintf("rpm -U --nodeps %s", filename);
00049         
00050         ret = system(execString);
00051         
00052         if (ret == -1) {
00053                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't execute command: %s", execString);
00054                 result = FALSE;
00055         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) == 127) {
00056                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't install rpm: 'rpm' command not found by shell");
00057                 result = FALSE;
00058         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) != 0) {
00059                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "RPM Command failed: %s", execString);
00060                 result = FALSE;
00061         } else {
00062                 result = TRUE;
00063         }
00064         
00065         g_free(execString);
00066                 
00067         return result;
00068 }
00069 
00070 gboolean luau_install_deb(const char *filename, GError **err) {
00071         int ret;
00072         char *execString;
00073         gboolean result;
00074         
00075         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00076         
00077         execString = lutil_mprintf("dpkg -i %s", filename);
00078         
00079         ret = system(execString);
00080         
00081         if (ret == -1) {
00082                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't execute command: %s", execString);
00083                 result = FALSE;
00084         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) == 127) {
00085                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't install deb package: 'dpkg' command not found by shell");
00086                 result = FALSE;
00087         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) != 0) {
00088                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "dpkg Command failed: %s", execString);
00089                 result = FALSE;
00090         } else {
00091                 result = TRUE;
00092         }
00093         
00094         g_free(execString);
00095         
00096         return result;
00097 }
00098 
00099 gboolean luau_install_src(const char *filename, GError **err) {
00100         g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_INVALID_ARG, "Source packages cannot be installed.  You must download and install them by hand");
00101         return FALSE;
00102 }
00103 
00104 gboolean luau_install_exec(const char *filename, GError **err) {
00105         int ret;
00106         gboolean result;
00107 
00108         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00109         
00110         ret = system(filename);
00111         
00112         if (ret == -1) {
00113                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Couldn't execute command: %s", filename);
00114                 result = FALSE;
00115         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) == 127) {
00116                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_INVALID_ARG, "Execution failed: could not find specified file");
00117                 result = FALSE;
00118         } else if (WEXITSTATUS(ret) != 0) {
00119                 g_set_error(err, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR, LUAU_INSTALL_ERROR_FAILED, "Execution failed.  See STDOUT for details");
00120                 result = FALSE;
00121         } else {
00122                 result = TRUE;
00123         }
00124         
00125         return result;
00126 }
00127 
00128 gboolean luau_install_autopkg(const char *filename, GError **err) {
00129         g_return_val_if_fail(err == NULL || *err == NULL, FALSE);
00130 
00131         return luau_install_exec(filename, err);
00132 }
